publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5541 Mr Brian Monteith: The Non-Domestic Rate (Scotland) Order 2007—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Non-Domestic Rate (Scotland) Order 2007 (SSI 2007/2).

S2M-5541 Mr Brian Monteith: The Non-Domestic Rate (Scotland) Order 2007—That the Local Government and Transport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Non-Domestic Rate (Scotland) Order 2007 (SSI 2007/2).
